attributes.action: Ban mps second homes, create hotels that is made for MPs which will create jobs
attributes.additional_details:
MPs shouldn't be allowed to claim any expenses than transport which includes mileage, airfares and train fares.
They should stay in a hotel only for mps etc, they eat there sleep there and if travelling they take a pack lunch from the hotel so the only claims they should be making is mileage, airfare or train fare ,just like we have to in our jobs.
This will create alot of jobs and there could be one in each area ie north west, north east, london etc.
